I'm just really interested in finding out about local ciders and parries and just trying
to open my eyes to different things really.
I came here last year and it was really good so I just had to come here again because it's
just a brilliant day.
There's so much to do and see and drink obviously.
Yeah, it's just a fantastic day.
I'm here with a group of my friends and it's the first time I've been to the cider festival
and it's really nice that we can taste a few different ciders, picking out the best ones.
So we've been writing them in the book and the Three Saints Blush is a quite light sweet
cider so that's quite a good one.
